title: A Tense Mood In Ferguson As Community Awaits Indictment Decision
teaser: Ferguson and the rest of the St. Louis area are waiting for the grand jury's decision in the Michael Brown case, and for some it feels like awaiting a natural disaster â€” except no one knows when it will arrive or how much disruption it could bring.
